name: Slow Cooker Vegetable Soup
author: susanmac
summary: This soup is a traditional vegetable soup with a little extra. I added homemade dumplings like my mom use to make for me. She made her soup with all the leftover vegetables in the refrigerator and then added dumplings. Good vegetarian soup without the meat.
ingredients: ¼ cup vegetable shortening (such as Crisco®)
¼ cup vegetable broth, or more if needed
directions: Combine 6 cups vegetable broth,  , tomatoes with their juice, potatoes, onion, barley, garlic, parsley, oregano, basil, salt, black pepper, and bay leaf in a slow cooker
Cover and cook on Low for 5 to 6 hours
Place flour in a bowl; cut shortening into flour using a pastry blender or two knives until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Add 1/4 cup vegetable broth; stir with a fork until dough no longer sticks on sides of bowl
Transfer dough to a lightly floured surface; roll out 1/8 inch thick
Cut dough into strips or small squares
Add to slow cooker; cook until dumplings are soft and cooked in the middle, 1 hour
